00021 void BQtGLWidget::paintGL()
00022 {
00023     // TODO we have to have something automatic in here in the future
00024     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00025     glLoadIdentity();
00026 
00027     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00028     glColor3f( 0.5, 0.5, 0.9 );
00029     glVertex3d( 0, 0, -0.05 );
00030     glVertex3d( .5, 0, -0.05 );
00031     glVertex3d( .5, .5, -0.05 );
00032     glVertex3d( 0, .5, -0.05 );
00033 
00034     glEnd();
00035 }
